creator: markt@apache.org
text:
That is a JVM crash, not a Tomcat crash. You should report it to your JVM vendor.

As a work-around, you should be able avoid the JVM bug by disabling compression.
No doubt this is a JVM crash. I have reported this to Oracle. Thank you for the workaround.
